Title: Thrissivaperoor Kliptham
Actors: Asif Ali, Aparna Balamurali, Chemban Vinod Jose, Achuthanandan
Plot: David Pauly ever wanted in life was to witness the downfall of his high school nemesis Chembaden Joey. When Joey louses up Davy's betrothal ceremony, Davy and his friends vow to scheme up something that would button up Joey forever.
